Subskills.name: Heavyweight Slam
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by leaping ambush.

Subskills.name: Envenomous Groundslam
Subskills.description: Unleash a burst of poison from the ground on hit dealing increased damage and inflicting poisoned.

Subskills.name: Tribal Spearnage
Subskills.description: Chance to rain down falling spears on hit dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Landing Blast
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of leaping ambush.

Subskills.name: Stunning Smash
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to stun the target.

Subskills.name: Crippling the Weak
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: Venomous Blastwave
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to inflict poisoned.

Subskills.name: Ground Stomper
Subskills.description: When landing, stomp the ground multiple times with increased area of effect radius and dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Adrenaline Rush
Subskills.description: Landing grants you a burst of attack speed and cast rate.

Subskills.name: Stoneskinned Warrior
Subskills.description: Gain increased damage reduction when leaping.

Subskills.name: Master of Agility
Subskills.description: Leaping ambush can now be casted through terrain with decreased damage.

Subskills.name: Arc of Spears
Subskills.description: Throw multiple piercing spears around you upon landing dealing increased damage.
